body_html:
Im have this issue as well:
mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j4
-- Looking for pthread.h
-- Looking for pthread.h - found
-- Looking for pthread_create
-- Looking for pthread_create - not found

Unknown CMake command "cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags".
Call Stack (most recent call first):
/home/clivecadogan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/cuda.cmake:332 (torch_cuda_get_nvcc_gencode_flag)
/home/clivecadogan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/share/cmake/Caffe2/Caffe2Config.cmake:88 (include)

make: *** [ops] Error 1

body:
Im have this issue as well:
mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j4
-- Looking for pthread.h
-- Looking for pthread.h - found
-- Looking for pthread_create
-- Looking for pthread_create - not found
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthreads
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthreads - not found
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthread
-- Looking for pthread_create in pthread - found
-- Found Threads: TRUE  
-- Found CUDA: /usr/local/cuda (found suitable version "10.0", minimum required is "7.0") 
-- Caffe2: CUDA detected: 10.0
-- Caffe2: CUDA nvcc is: /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
-- Caffe2: CUDA toolkit directory: /usr/local/cuda
-- Caffe2: Header version is: 10.0
-- Found CUDNN: /usr/include  
-- Found cuDNN: v5.1.10  (include: /usr/include, library: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudnn.so)
CMake Error at /home/clivecadogan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/utils.cmake:192 (cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags):
  Unknown CMake command "cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags".
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/clivecadogan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/cuda.cmake:332 (torch_cuda_get_nvcc_gencode_flag)
  /home/clivecadogan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/share/cmake/Caffe2/Caffe2Config.cmake:88 (include)
  CMakeLists.txt:8 (find_package)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/clivecadogan/densepose/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/home/clivecadogan/densepose/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
Makefile:13: recipe for target 'ops' failed
make: *** [ops] Error 1
